coreAttributes.authorTag: The letters 'NHOM' have been precisely etched into the back of the fitness tracker.
coreAttributes.name: fitness tracker
coreAttributes.description: A popular fitness tracker. Like your phone, you've figured out how to charge it using arcane energy.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the fitness tracker onto [npc.her] wrist and [npc.verb(fasten)] the strap.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the fitness tracker onto [npc2.namePos] wrist and [npc.verb(fasten)] the strap.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(strap)] the fitness tracker onto [npc2.namePos] wrist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap of [npc.her] fitness tracker and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap of [npc2.namePos] fitness tracker and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap of [npc2.namePos] fitness tracker and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
